column3: afei boa dɔmtukuw ano: ɔaka hɛn ehin mu ehyia: wɔdze abaa bobɔ Israel tsɛmbuafo nyepi."

column4: wo a isuar dɛ ebɔfora Israel mpempem mu
column5: wo mu na obi befir ama me
column6: na oebedzi panyin wɔ Israel do; no mpuei fir tsetse

column3: ekodu ber a ɔwokofo no bɔwo: nna no nuanom nkaase no bɛsan aba Israelmba nkyɛn."
na ɔanyɛn no nguankuw no wɔ EWURADZE n'ahoɔdzen mu
column4: wɔ EWURADZE ne Nyankopɔn no ne dzin tumdzi mu: na wɔbɛtsena hɔ; osiandɛ ɔbɛyɛ kɛse ekesi asaase ewiei."

column2: "Na nyimpa yi na ɔbɛyɛ hɛn asomdwee: na sɛ Asirianyi ba hɛn asaase do
column3: na otsiatsia hɛn ahemfi mu a
column4: nna yɛbɛhyehyɛ nguanhwɛfo beesuon na nyimpa etsitsir baawɔtwe etsia no."

column2: "Na wɔdze afona bɛyɛ Asiria na Nimrod nsaase no amamfo wɔ no mbobokɛse ano: na ɔbɛgye hɛn efi Asirianyi no nsamu
column3: ber a Asirianyi no bɛba hɛn asaase do
column4: na oebetsiatsia hɛn he do no."

column2: "Na Jakob ne nkaase no ɔbɛyɛ dɛ ɔbɔsu a ofi EWURADZE hɔ wɔ amanaman pii mu
column3: dɛ nkyɛkyɛr do nsupetsema a ɔnnhwɛ nyimpa bi kwan

column2: "Na Jakob ne nkaase no bɛyɛ wɔ amanaman mu
column5: dɛ gyatafɔr wɔ nguan ekuwekuw mu: ɔno a sɛ ɔhɛn mu a
column8: na obi nnyi hɔ a ɔgye."

column2: "Ma wo nsa mma do wɔ w'ahohiahiafo do
column3: na ma w'atamfo nyina tun ntwa."

column2: "Na ɔbɛba dɛ da no mu no
column4: mubotwa wo mpɔnkɔ efi wo finimfin

column2: "na mubotwitwa w'asaase do nkurow no egu
"na mubotwitwa wo mbɔnsansɛm efi wo nsamu; na innkenya sebramufo bio:"
"na mubotwitwa ehonyi a egu na w'abosondum efi wo finimfin; na ennkɔkotow asɔr wo nsaano edwuma bio."
"Na mubotwitwa w'abosompɔw a wɔfrɛ no Asera no efi wo finimfin: na masɛɛ wo nkurow."
"Na mobɔtɔ amanaman a woenntsie me no do wer wɔ ebufuw na ebufuwhyew mu."
